reviewText: Absolutly beautiful movie and an incredible story of Mei Lanfang's life  I have watched it over and over and enjoy it each time.  This movie is just one reason I am starting to learn Mandarin.  The more I learn about China's culture the more I want to learn.

I was shocked at how clear the DVD played.  I will leave others to give extensive movie reviews but will offer that the story is a good one and Zhang Ziyi is as always terrific.

The key point I wanted to make is that you is that the seller sent me a solid DVD that played great.
This film will keep you forever enthralled. It is a true story of a great talent. I saw it at a film festival in India and had to get a copy for my library.
